feed.title: 西去无狗
feed.subtitle: 你的时间有限，所以不要为别人而活。不要被教条所限，不要活在别人的观念里。不要让别人的意见左右自己内心的声音。最重要的是，勇敢地去追随自己的心灵和直觉，只有自己的心灵和直觉才知道你自己的真实想法，其他一切都是次要。

entry.title: Friend Shoot中文
entry.content: 尝试下中文是不是乱码呢？ This was one of the most recent photoshoots in Washington DC. People whom I’ve met were very lovely and I loved being their photographer! I was even entertained myself while I was taking photographs of them. I’m very happy that I met those people!
entry.summary: 尝试下中文是不是乱码呢？ This was one of the most recent photoshoots in Washington DC. People whom I’ve met were very lovely and I loved being their photographer! I was even entertained myself while I was taking photographs of them. I’m very happy that I met those people!

entry.title: Baby Princess
entry.content: This is one of my favorite shoots from the hospital. The baby was gorgeous! Parents were happy and they wanted a photoshoot. I loved the photographs, especially how they came out.
entry.summary: This is one of my favorite shoots from the hospital. The baby was gorgeous! Parents were happy and they wanted a photoshoot. I loved the photographs, especially how they came out.

entry.title: June. Newborn
entry.content: Below are some of my favorite newborn photographs from June, 2019. Loved when parents and siblings wanted to be in the photographs too.
entry.summary: Below are some of my favorite newborn photographs from June, 2019. Loved when parents and siblings wanted to be in the photographs too.

entry.title: May. Newborn
entry.content: Below are some of my favorite newborn photographs from May, 2019. I was shooting almost non-stop that month!
entry.summary: Below are some of my favorite newborn photographs from May, 2019. I was shooting almost non-stop that month!

entry.title: Newborns are Fun!
entry.content: I recently started shooting lifestyle newborn photoshoots in a hospital. After this month, there would be month by month best photographs from the photoshoots in the hospital. I enjoy doing it, enjoy looking at happy parents and happy newborns, this is one of the best jobs one could ever have!
entry.summary: I recently started shooting lifestyle newborn photoshoots in a hospital. After this month, there would be month by month best photographs from the photoshoots in the hospital. I enjoy doing it, enjoy looking at happy parents and happy newborns, this is one of the best jobs one could ever have!

entry.title: Engagement Photoshoot
entry.content: I was approached by the lovely couple if I could do a photoshoot with them two together. It was also a make up trial for the future bride. The whole photoshoot was very interesting and enjoyable, especially considering that the weather was perfect and it was in one of the parks in Washington DC.
entry.summary: I was approached by the lovely couple if I could do a photoshoot with them two together. It was also a make up trial for the future bride. The whole photoshoot was very interesting and enjoyable, especially considering that the weather was perfect and it was in one of the parks in Washington DC.

entry.title: Cherry Blossom Photoshoot Meetup
entry.content: I organize meetups for fellow photographers and models (or people who want to practice their modeling skills). Had a couple of great shots that day! Loved how people posed. Also, loved walking around Tidal Basin when it wasn’t as crowded during that day.
entry.summary: I organize meetups for fellow photographers and models (or people who want to practice their modeling skills). Had a couple of great shots that day! Loved how people posed. Also, loved walking around Tidal Basin when it wasn’t as crowded during that day.

entry.title: A Little Experiment
entry.content: I was contacted by a makeup artist asking if I want to take a photo of her work. I replied that, yes, I would love to. In the end, it was one of my favorite photoshoots. I loved every part of it. Also, I loved her work. Since I don’t normally do these kinds of photoshoots, this is called “an experiment”.
entry.summary: I was contacted by a makeup artist asking if I want to take a photo of her work. I replied that, yes, I would love to. In the end, it was one of my favorite photoshoots. I loved every part of it. Also, I loved her work. Since I don’t normally do these kinds of photoshoots, this is called “an experiment”.

entry.title: Still Life Photoshoot
entry.content: I like experimenting and being creative. One of the things where you actually have to think about and to be very creative is still life photography. No matter what are you taking photographs of in still life, even in food photography, you have to be creative. That’s one of my experiments and I actually enjoyed it.
entry.summary: I like experimenting and being creative. One of the things where you actually have to think about and to be very creative is still life photography. No matter what are you taking photographs of in still life, even in food photography, you have to be creative. That’s one of my experiments and I actually enjoyed it.

entry.title: Family Photoshoot
entry.content: A family won a photoshoot from me in one of my giveaways. It was a family photoshoot in one of the local parks in Washington, DC area (near Annapolis, Maryland). I tried to make as relaxing and as fun as possible. And they’ve enjoyed it!
entry.summary: A family won a photoshoot from me in one of my giveaways. It was a family photoshoot in one of the local parks in Washington, DC area (near Annapolis, Maryland). I tried to make as relaxing and as fun as possible. And they’ve enjoyed it!
